message.body: So, do you have webbed feet?
No I just love duck tales
Agreed. I'm still getting over the fact that you couldn't swim in money if there were a room full of it, very fiscally demotivating.
I bet you could if the money was in a gelatin solution.
You are a genius. Did you figure that out long ago, or just now? Either way, genius.
Just now but I am full of great ideas
Pregnant with them. Bursting with them. Endangered by their rate of proliferation.
Give me more
I once made a hatchet out of aspirins
up at the bottom at an unswimmable density. Hatchet out of aspirin? Did you go to art school?
I refuse to be made fun of for it
P.S. I was thinking that you'd have to construct the jello and coins in layers and wait for each to set before pouring the next or the change would pile
Yeah that would work.
I made jello out of my fingernail clippings once
It was a foul smelling process
But what about you
What have you made out of your body parts?
That's a good question. It's been awhile. In high school, my friends and I used to do elaborate dirty tampon pranks and call it Operation Menstruation, o
r OpMen.
Also, one of my high school friends smoked a bong-pack of toenail clippings, and another from college makes money now selling jewelry made out of em, andtiny bears made of belly bottom lint.
Belly button
It sounds like we could probably hang out and it wouldn't be too boring
What do you do now?
I don't know. I just finished grad school and am going to teach a cardboard warfare camp in Minneapolis.
Soap factory?
No, it's in a park. I did apply for a show at the Soap Factory though
I did too this year
I have to turn my phone off for takeoff, but let's disturb more later.
Where did you go to grad school
Oh no yer gunna figure out who I am. You first!
Ok just add me as a preferred partner
Do you know who I am
Don't use my name just yes or no
Not yet, but probably in the end. We'll put off the discovery, and I'll figure out how to add you after I land.
Ok sounds fun
I'm off the plane, just making some giant bat wings. What are you doing?
Casting stuff out of pet hair and glue and listening to killa priest
What kinda glue is best for pet hair?
Just watered down white glue is best for most things
Thistothat.com doesn't list pet hair.
I would fear that it would crack
I don't know that site. What is its deal?
You should never be afraid of things breaking it usually just makes um better
Just welding and using the angle grinder b 4 bed
It tells u how to glue all kinds of shit to all kinds of other shit.
I'm crocheting a hood that looks like someone else's face until bed. I don't seriously know how to weld, but just inherited a modest metalworking shop. Goodnight.
Nite
